title: South Bend Cubs Game
description: Come to the first Off-Campus event of the year: Thirsty Thursday at Four Winds Field. Lottery opens Wednesday at 5:00pm!

title: Pumpkin Carving at Irish Row
description: Our hallways aren't looking spooky enough! Join the Row residents in a pumpkin carving night at 8pm on the 25th. Meet in the lobby!

title: Irish Crossings Block Party
description: Meet your Crossings neighbors in our annual block party! It will begin at 3pm. Hope to see you there!

title: Off-Campus Formal
description: The first official Off-Campus Formal will be held at Corby's on the 25th! Doors open at 10pm and tickets are $10 each.
